name: Starry Moon Island 2
description:
This is a game like the old game on 8-bit console，
The story tells the story of the war on The Star Moon Island.
Our legendary hero, the Peach Blossom Maiden Warrior,
crushes the evil fat pig ruler and liberates the entire island from its hands.

Featur

The game have ten Capter，
Each chapter has a different way of playing。

Chapter 1： Out Of Control ：It is a horizontal scroll shooting game，Tell the story of the process of gaining power by the fat pig king
Chapter 2： Red Snake ：It is a Top-Down shooting game，Tell the story of the main character's escape from prison
Chapter 3： Star Ocean： It is a Top-Down shooting game in Space，Tells the story of the protagonist destroying the space surveillance system of the fat pig king
Chapter 4： Break Out： It is a fps game，Tells the story of the protagonist's raid and occupation of the fortress of the fat pig king
Chapter 5： Mobile Stronghold： It is a Tower Defense game，It tells the story of the main character's control of the mobile fortress against the army of fat pig kings
Chapter 6： Cannon War： It is a RTS game，The main character takes the fortress as the center and establishes the rebels' battle against the fat pig king
Chapter 7： Perimeter： It is a horizontal scroll shooting game in Space，It tells the story of the battle between the protagonist and the fat pig king for control of space
Chapter 8： DNA War： It is a RTS game，It tells the story of the genetic battle between the protagonist and the fat pig king caused by the genetically modified super warrior
Chapter 9： Tank Advance： It is a fps game，Tell the story of a fortress attack from the perspective of a tank driver
Chapter 10： Cannonade： It is a horizontal scroll shooting game，From the artillery perspective, the main character's attack on the Fat Pig King Fortress is described
